Nouy: Sovereign bonds are not risk free and there should be some kind of large exposure limit
Nouy: I believe we will be able to harmonise the majority of national options, although some could prove a bit more difficult
Nouy: We are committed to do our part in the EBA stress test and it is foreseen to have the exercise in 2016
Nouy: There is a strong and efficient element of proportionality in our banking supervision
Nouy: Need to harmonise bank capital definition where appropriate and in a rigorous way
Nouy: Supervisory priorities include focus on quality of bank capital in particular in relation to deferred tax assets and tax credits
Nouy: Large stock of problem assets in some banks adversely affect banks' lending capacity
Nouy: Two sizable challenges remain for banking sector: relatively weak profitability and large stock of legacy problem assets
Nouy: Banking sector well equipped to withstand the most plausible adverse shocks
